name: Furry Gladiators
description:
Controls:

Left: A-Key / D-Pad or analogue left
Right: D-Key / D-Pad analogue right
Jump: K-Key / A-Button
Throw: J-Key / X-Button

Having grown up playing Sega Genesis a lot, I loved this game called "Global Gladiators". Ever since I started programming, I was waiting for the day when I can make a game that is loosely based on its bonus stage... and here we are now!

Your goal is to pick up the fruits and sort them while also avoiding falling blocks and other obstacles. The difficulty scales over time and will keep you on your toes.

This is my first little completed game and I am excited to share it with you guys!
I'd appreciate feedback and let me know your high scores ;)

I am a programmer and did not make any of the art and music myself!
All assets are used under creative commons and made by these amazing people:

Art Assets:
Sunnyland and Sunnyland Forest by ANSIMUZ
www.ansimuz.com

Music:
Celebration in Slow Motion,
Logical Sequence of Events,
Crimson Nights Back in Town
and Funky Love Disco Pump by TeknoAxe
www.teknoaxe.com

Sounds:
sfx-jump-30 by Jalastram

Multiple files by LittleRobotSoundFactory
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/

Fonts:
Beon
Minecraft
#arcade #other #platformer #retro
